comments.body: nit: better to have another test case with matching label, but no matching field

done.
Please review again :)  @yliaog

add a test case for a field selector and label selector that specify negative matches on index keys and ensure MatcherIndex does not include them

```
		"Negative match field and label": {
			labelSelector: "name!=foo",
			fieldSelector: "uid!=12345",
			indexLabels:   []string{"name"},
			indexFields:   []string{"uid"},
			expected:      nil,
		},
```
